thought: To craft a diamond_hoe, I need to craft a diamond and two sticks. A diamond can be crafted from a diamond_block, which is available at slot 40, so I will move the diamond_block to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1
